full_text:
In the Court of the Additional Chief Judicial Magistrate,
Thiruvananthapuram
Present: Elsa Catherine George
Additional Chief Judicial Magistrate.
Dated the 4" day of March 2025
CC : 387/2025
Complainant : State represented by the Sub Inspector of Police,
Poojappura Police Station in Crime No. 290/2025
(By A.P.P )
Accused : Vignesh, Vishnu Vihar, Vidhyadhiraja Nagar, Thirumala
Village.
Charge : u/s 27(b) of Narcotic Drugs and Psychotropic
Substances Act
Plea : Guilty
Finding : Guilty
Sentence/order : Accused is found guilty of offence u/s 27(b) of NDPS
Act and he is convicted thereunder. Accused is
sentenced to pay fine of % 1000/- for the offence
punishable w/s.27(b) of NDPS Act and in default; to
undergo simple imprisonment for 10 days.
JUDGMENT
1. Accused stands charged with the offence punishable u/s 27(b) of Narcotic
Drugs and Psychotropic Substances Act.
2. Accused entered appearance. Requirements u/s.207 Cr.PC was complied with.

The particulars of offences were read over and explained to the accused to
which he pleaded guilty. I accept the plea since I am convinced of its
genuineness and that the same is made voluntarily. Hence, I find the accused
guilty of the offence punishable u/s.27(b) of NDPS Act and accordingly the
accused is convicted and sentenced to pay a fine of %1000/- for the offence
punishable u/s.27(b) of Narcotic Drugs and Psychotropic Substances Act and in
default; to undergo simple imprisonment for 10 days.
Dated this the 4" day of March 2025.
